column4: I've just quit totem but it's still in the process list eating CPU and memory and I cannot kill it. ps aux|grep totem gives: kliklik 17893  8.5  9.5 168696 71068 ?        Dl   14:17  21:03 totem file:///home/kliklik... How can I kill it if it doesn't respond to kill -9 ?
it's a poor solution but if it's the only way than ok...
